data.eml:eml: Prionospio (Polychaeta, Spionidae) from the Grand Caribbean Region, with the descriptions of five new species and a key to species recorded in the area

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Delgado-Blas, Víctor Hugo (2015): Prionospio (Polychaeta, Spionidae) from the Grand Caribbean Region, with the descriptions of five new species and a key to species recorded in the area. Zootaxa 3905 (1): 69-90, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.1.4
